name: Perfect Wave - [Brackeys GameJam 2021.2]
description:
SORRY : for the typos

This game was made in 7 days for the Brackeys GameJam 2021.2

Where are you ? Who are they ? What do they want from you ? And what did they do to you ?

Try to escape this place by eliminating those who want to harm you in your path. 

Perfect Wave is a die and retry fast game! Find the best path to clear the stages and beat the game with the less life's loss

Good luck..
